author: third_watch
title: Family held captive by Taliban-linked group released
summary: WASHINGTON (AP) — An American woman, her Canadian husband and their three young children have been released after years of being held captive by a group with ties to the Taliban and called a terrorist organization by the United States, American and Pakistani officials said Thursday.

author: Yahoo News
title: 'Shame on you!': San Juan mayor fires back after Trump warns about disaster relief
summary: The president warned on Thursday that he might pull federal relief workers from Puerto Rico even as the island struggles to recover from Hurricane Maria.

author: third_watch
title: All the women who have accused Harvey Weinstein of sexual misconduct so far
summary: One by one, women subjected to Harvey Weinstein's sexual misconduct during his decades in the film industry are speaking out.

author: ipostwhaticareabout
title: Republican senator asks Trump if he's 'recanting oath' over war with press
summary: Donald Trump's ongoing war with the media over "fake news" escalated on Wednesday with the president calling for networks, and specifically NBC, to have their licenses revoked over reporting what he called "pure fiction." And one Republican senator inserted himself in the middle of the fight Wednesday evening. The White House and Defense Secretary Jim Mattis denied the report. Trump's threat to pull NBC's license drew Sen. Ben Sasse, R-Neb., into the fight.
